name: Hanoi Elegance Diamond Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: While this is a boutique hotel and does not offer the range of facilities you might find in a large chain hotel, what it does, it does very well indeed.
reviews.title: Fantastic Boutique Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms are extremely well appointed and the attention to detail is very impressive, down to the Laptop on the desk.
reviews.title: great value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: The restaurant/bar/lounge on the 12th floor makes extremely good use of the space available and is very good.
reviews.title: Hanoi elegance diamond hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Breakfast is the best I have experienced in Vietnam and is a mixture of Buffet and table ordered items (Omelets etc).
reviews.title: The only place to stay in Hanoi

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: Finally, the crowning glory of this hotel is the staff, who are the most helpful and friendly I think I have ever encountered. They go beyond the call of duty to help people and nothing was too much trouble for them.
reviews.title: Great service from staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: This place was very comfy. The staff were amazing and the deluxe double room was very clean and a delight to be in. Their staff have everything covered. The restaurant was great when needed. The location was very easy to shops, great eats and water puppets. Thankyou so much to everyone who recommended this hotel. We would never have found it without you.
reviews.title: Wow

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A really lovely hotel with well equipped rooms, some larger than others. The staff are very friendly, attentive and helpful. Right in the middle of the old quarter so in the middle of all the hustle and bustle which we loved, loads of restaurants, bars and shops all close by and all major attractions within easy if hot, walking distance. Returned to this hotel after trip to Halong Bay(they happily kept out luggage whilst away), we were then given a larger room. Nice touch, fresh basket of fruit given daily, which was really appreciated.
reviews.title: Fantastic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Overall would highly recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Calm and friendly

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled on business
reviews.text: Highly recommended, super- friendly staff, excellent English who went out of their way to help, tastefully decorated, great location. Provide family rooms
reviews.title: Diamond in Hanoi

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I can't believe their fantastic service and room condition which as well as 5 stars hotel buy paid only 3 stars. Everything is perfect since you step into hotel till check out. I will absolutely return when I be there and recommend other people to stay there.
reviews.title: best hotel in Vietnam

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: My daughter and l spent 3 nights here in a Deluxe Twin room. The room was beautifully fitted out and to our surprise there was even a free laptop to use, so no more seeking out internet connections. Staff were fabulous and organised taxis, massages and day trips for us. The bar and dining room on the top floor were lovely, as was the breakfast.
reviews.title: Compact hotel in good position

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011
reviews.text: The smallest hiccup was that the room was fractionally small for 2 oversize single beds, but that isn't a huge consideration when the bulk of your time is not spent indoors. After trying various massage places in the old quarter, we spent our last hour in the hotels facility. It was gorgeous and is highly recommended as an indulgence before flying out.
reviews.title: outstanding little hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: had a recent very welcoming stay here. Staff very courteous and helpful, room-junior suite good value for money, good location in hanoi
reviews.title: Great hospitality and good location in the old quarter

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: The staff at Hanoi Elegance Diamond Hotel really go out of their way to ensure that you have an enjoyable stay. From the moment we checked-in until we left, the service was exceptional, and they even went out of their way to go next door and help us order a bahn mi sandwich or walk around the corner to help us translate at the pharmacy. At breakfast, one of the reception staff will walk around to greet each group and inquire about their plans for the day and give advice.
reviews.title: Amazing hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms are a good size - not the biggest ones you will find, but that is what you expect from a boutique hotel - and it is more than comfortable. The hotel is pretty new, the rooms are well appointed, and the bathrooms are modern and clean and comes with a rainfall shower. The one thing that can be improved is the bed which was just slightly springy.
reviews.title: World-class service. An example for other hotels to follow!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Just returned from a wonderful trip to Hanoi. We moved from Sofitel Metropole to Elegance Diamond based on the rave reviews here. Well, we are not appointed. At this price one should not expect luxury. The Hotel has more than one can possibly ask for - room is of good size, clean, tastefully designed, plus a notebook and free fruits!
reviews.title: Perfect, except 11th floor
Another perfect "Elegance" experience
reviews.text: The only point I should perhaps bring to your attention is that we were assigned a room on the 11th floor, which is rigt beneath the restaurant. Around lunch and dinner hours, we could hear very clearly how many were walking above us. Of course, as per expected, at 5am we were awakened when the staff literally kicked off the day. We had to catch a morning flight today and we were only there for one night. This did not bother us too much. If however you plan for a longer stay or if you prefer more sleep, you'd better ask for rooms on other floors or wear ear-plugs.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Other than this, everything is perfect.
reviews.title: Best service I have ever experienced, would recommend to anyone!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We decided to stay with the Elegance group again based on our previous experience at another of their hotels in November 2009. We chose the Diamond based on their reviews and were certainly not disappointed. The reservation process was very quick and efficient and their rates are excellent - certainly great value for money.
reviews.title: This will be the benchmark for all future hotels.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our pre-arranged airport pick-up was already there to meet us on arrival. Check-in also quick and efficiently handled by professional staff. Our deluxe double room was spacious with a large, modern bathroom.Quality decor and fittings throughout.
reviews.title: Service was too good

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Booked this hotel on the advice of Trip Adviser reviews. Would normally book a 4 or 5 star chain but wanted to stay in a hotel that was central and in the Old Quarter. I decided to book the Junior Suite which was fabulous value at $90 USD a night. The room was very spacious, a balcony overlooking the chaos of Hanoi and very modern and clean. In fact, probably the most comfortable bed I've slept in. I don't think it was necessary to book the Suite as we had a peek in some of the standard rooms and all looked clean and modern.
reviews.title: Highly recommended

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast is on the top floor in the restaurant. Although small it has great views and selection was quite good.
reviews.title: Perfect Choice, Great Staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled solo
reviews.text: The staff throughout the hotel were so helpful and knowledgeable. Every time we went out they were asking if they could be of assistance. I usually do all my own tour booking but it is really worthwhile to let the staff here to take care of everything.
reviews.title: Bliss

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I debated whether to stay here or the Elite Hotel. On wandering about the street, we discovered this hotel and although it seemed equally as lovely and probably a little more central, the hotel does not have a lift so if you are staying on the 6th floor, you might want to be relatively fit.
reviews.title: Highly recommended

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Overall, would not hesitate in recommend this hotel. Mostly because of the staff and the location. Excellent value!!
reviews.title: Excellent hotel with exceptional staff will reccommend it.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The title says it all. Upon booking on an online agency we were contacted by the hotel to see if they could help us in any other way. They ended up arranging airport transfers, tours, train bookings to Sapa return and accommodating us quickly and efficiently when emailing back to them with the odd date we needed extra accommodation as we were using Hanoi as a travel hub.
reviews.title: They've "Got it right"

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The service at the hotel from when we arrived until the time we left was exceptional. No question or request was a problem. Everything a traveler needs was provided in the rooms. The staff being very literate in English was a big bonus. The restaurant provided excellent smorgasbord breakfasts with a huge variety, a comprehensive dining menu including good wine and room service. There are wonderful 360 views of the city from the restaurant on the top floor with staff that are caring , efficient and friendly. Mr Bing (not sure that is the right spelling) the manager, was fantastic.
reviews.title: Perfect Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: We travel a lot and can honestly say this hotel is at the top of the rating as far as we are concerned. Thank you to all those who made our stay a success. Trevor and Barbara.
reviews.title: Great hotel in busy, central location - take a taxi, don't walk!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The Elegance Diamond Hotel was the perfect choice for us. The staff couldn't have been friendlier and they made sure we were happy and well taken care of. Such beautiful smiles. The Hotel is in a great location just a couple blocks from a lovely lake. The rooms are spacious and well equipped and have a nice assortment of candy/snacks in the room for purchase. The beds are very comfortable and had flowers strewn on the bed - such a sweet touch. The breakfast buffet was delicious with lots of choices. Not only is there a buffet, you get a choice of an entree dish that is also included. It's such a lovely hotel. Do stay there - we certainly will again when we return.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel, perfect location, amazing staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed for 3 nights in April at the Hotel Elegance Diamond in Hanoi when we first arrived in Vietnam. The hotel itself is situated in a very busy section of Hanoi where the streets are cramped and near impossible to cross. You are in walking distance of many restaurants and great shopping and also the lake, but you have to be prepared to take your life into your own hands by crossing the crazy streets. That said - the hotel itself is great. The staff were lovely and very helpful, the rooms look like they have been recently refurbished and where spacious and comfortable and very modern. Comfy beds (especially by Vietnam standards, as hard mattresses seem to be the way to go). We had a family room which had 2 x queen beds and plenty of room.
reviews.title: Everything about this hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: After a 13 hour hot sweaty and cramped flight we arrived in Vietnam at 6am, the hotel arranged to collect us and were promptly waiting at the airport. On arrival at the hotel we were greeted from the point the car door opened bags carried, complimentary mocktail and then they went through the details of hotel, areas of interest in Hanoi, customs and culture very brief but vitally important. The hotel is very clean, modern and the staff are so friendly and pamper to your everyday needs. If it is your first time here in Hanoi then come here as they will ensure you enjoy your stay and will take care of you.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here as a couple and found the service extremely wonderful. It is rated as a 3 star hotel but we surely got 5 star service. It's a very tidy hotel and the staff are lovely. Our room was great and breakfast on the rooftop was just awesome. I cannot describe how much we enjoyed staying here, highly recommended to all who will be visiting Hanoi.
reviews.title: Deserves To Be a 5 Star Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013
reviews.text: From the complimentary mocktail on arrival in the foyer to each staff member remembering both of us and what we have been doing each day, their attention to detail is fantastic.
reviews.title: Best service I have ever had from a hotel.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The executive suite was beautifully presented, with rose petals on the bed in a heart shape, free wine each day, plenty of free bottled water, and fruit.
reviews.title: Exceptional hotel with excellent service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: The only concern would be noise. If you don't want to hear the sounds of the street then this might not be the place for you. But then Ha Noi may not be the right place in that event anyway.
reviews.title: Wonderful Surprise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had an excellent stay here! Staff was courteous and they gave us the executive suite with a balcony for our honeymoon ... It was awesome! Most importantly Rooms were clean , new and well kept. The breakfast was great with Pho, French Toast and Eggs made to order on Level 12...Distance to the Lake was very near and there were a lot of shops around selling authentic vietnamese coffee and souvenirs. Highly recommended for anyone planning to stay in Hanoi.
reviews.title: Excellent Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is the best hotel I have stayed at, better than the 5-star chains. We had arranged for pick-up at the airport which would otherwise have been sketchy because of suspicious taxi companies. The cost for the 1-hour drive from the airport was a mere $18.00. We were greeted with smiles, a cold drink (which was most welcome as it is very hot), and we were seated in the lobby while the attendants did the check-in. We were then accompanied to our room where attendant showed us around and explained all of the amenities. Our luggage was delivered to our room.
reviews.title: Outstanding

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As it was quite late in the evening, we opted to dine in the rooftop restaurant. The food is delicious offering an array of Vietnamese and Western food options. The prices are so reasonable, including the drinks and wine options and the service again, simply outstanding. Breakfast is included and there is a range of options available including an a la carte menu.
reviews.title: Above and Beyond
Excellent Experience
reviews.text: We simply love this hotel. We are still here and would love to stay longer if we could.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled solo
reviews.text: We stayed here following reviews from Trip Advisor, and surely weren't disappointed!! The rooms are spacious and impeccably clean, the amenities are fantastic and the location is superb- right in the old quarter one block from the lake and easy walking distance to many restaurants and shops.
reviews.title: Outstanding Hanoi Hotel in Old Quarter!

description: Prime location in the Old Quarter, 2 minute walk from Hoan Kiem Lake, boutique in size & style with streamlined service & luxury rooms, elegant decor with modern technology.
